mapper.sql: SELECT T.CLAIM_CALCULATION_GUID, T.CLAIM_CALC_GRAIN_QUANTITY_GUID, T.PRIMARY_PERIL_CODE, T.SECONDARY_PERIL_CODE, T.CLAIM_STATUS_CODE, T.COMMODITY_COVERAGE_CODE, T.CALCULATION_STATUS_CODE, T.INSURANCE_PLAN_ID, T.CROP_COMMODITY_ID, T.CROP_YEAR, T.INSURED_BY_MEAS_TYPE, T.POLICY_NUMBER, T.CONTRACT_ID, T.CLAIM_NUMBER, T.CALCULATION_VERSION, T.REVISION_COUNT, T.GROWER_NUMBER, T.GROWER_NAME, T.GROWER_ADDRESS_LINE1, T.GROWER_ADDRESS_LINE2, T.GROWER_POSTAL_CODE, T.GROWER_CITY, T.GROWER_PROVINCE, T.TOTAL_CLAIM_AMOUNT, T.CALCULATION_COMMENT, T.SUBMITTED_BY_USERID, T.SUBMITTED_BY_NAME, T.SUBMITTED_BY_DATE, T.RECOMMENDED_BY_USERID, T.RECOMMENDED_BY_NAME, T.RECOMMENDED_BY_DATE, T.APPROVED_BY_USERID, T.APPROVED_BY_NAME, T.APPROVED_BY_DATE, T.CALCULATE_IIV_IND, T.HAS_CHEQUE_REQ_IND, T.CREATE_CLAIM_CALC_USER_GUID, T.CREATE_USER, T.CREATE_DATE, T.UPDATE_CLAIM_CALC_USER_GUID, T.UPDATE_USER, T.UPDATE_DATE

, CASE WHEN CR_CCU.GIVEN_NAME IS NOT NULL AND CR_CCU.FAMILY_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN CR_CCU.GIVEN_NAME || ' ' || CR_CCU.FAMILY_NAME ELSE COALESCE(COALESCE(CR_CCU.GIVEN_NAME, CR_CCU.FAMILY_NAME), 'Unknown') END AS CREATE_CLAIM_CALC_USER_NAME, CASE WHEN UPD_CCU.GIVEN_NAME IS NOT NULL AND UPD_CCU.FAMILY_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN UPD_CCU.GIVEN_NAME || ' ' || UPD_CCU.FAMILY_NAME ELSE COALESCE(COALESCE(UPD_CCU.GIVEN_NAME, UPD_CCU.FAMILY_NAME), 'Unknown') END AS UPDATE_CLAIM_CALC_USER_NAME, CT.COMMODITY_NAME, CCC.DESCRIPTION AS COVERAGE_NAME, (CASE WHEN CCPX.CROP_COMMODITY_ID_PEDIGREE IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' else 'N' end) as IS_PEDIGREE_IND
mapper.select: , IP.INSURANCE_PLAN_NAME FROM CLAIM_CALCULATION T JOIN CROP_COMMODITY CT ON CT.CROP_COMMODITY_ID = T.CROP_COMMODITY_ID JOIN COMMODITY_COVERAGE_CODE CCC ON CCC.COMMODITY_COVERAGE_CODE = T.COMMODITY_COVERAGE_CODE JOIN INSURANCE_PLAN IP ON IP.INSURANCE_PLAN_ID = T.INSURANCE_PLAN_ID LEFT JOIN CLAIM_CALCULATION_USER CR_CCU ON CR_CCU.CLAIM_CALCULATION_USER_GUID = T.CREATE_CLAIM_CALC_USER_GUID LEFT JOIN CLAIM_CALCULATION_USER UPD_CCU ON UPD_CCU.CLAIM_CALCULATION_USER_GUID = T.UPDATE_CLAIM_CALC_USER_GUID LEFT JOIN CROP_COMMODITY_PEDIGREE_XREF CCPX ON CCPX.CROP_COMMODITY_ID_PEDIGREE = T.CROP_COMMODITY_ID WHERE T.CLAIM_CALCULATION_GUID = #{claimCalculationGuid}
mapper.update: UPDATE CLAIM_CALCULATION SET CLAIM_CALC_GRAIN_QUANTITY_GUID = #{dto.claimCalculationGrainQuantityGuid, javaType=java.lang.String , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, PRIMARY_PERIL_CODE = #{dto.primaryPerilCode, javaType=java.lang.String , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, SECONDARY_PERIL_CODE = #{dto.secondaryPerilCode, javaType=java.lang.String , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, CLAIM_STATUS_CODE = #{dto.claimStatusCode, javaType=java.lang.String , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, HAS_CHEQUE_REQ_IND = #{dto.hasChequeReqInd, javaType=java.lang.Boolean , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, CALCULATION_STATUS_CODE = #{dto.calculationStatusCode, javaType=java.lang.String , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, REVISION_COUNT = REVISION_COUNT + 1, GROWER_NUMBER = #{dto.growerNumber, javaType=java.lang.Integer , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, GROWER_NAME = #{dto.growerName, javaType=java.lang.String , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, GROWER_ADDRESS_LINE1 = #{dto.growerAddressLine1, javaType=java.lang.String , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, GROWER_ADDRESS_LINE2 = #{dto.growerAddressLine2, javaType=java.lang.String , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, GROWER_POSTAL_CODE = #{dto.growerPostalCode, javaType=java.lang.String , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, GROWER_CITY = #{dto.growerCity, javaType=java.lang.String , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, GROWER_PROVINCE = #{dto.growerProvince, javaType=java.lang.String , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, TOTAL_CLAIM_AMOUNT = #{dto.totalClaimAmount, javaType=java.lang.Double , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, CALCULATION_COMMENT = #{dto.calculationComment, javaType=java.lang.String , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, SUBMITTED_BY_USERID = #{dto.submittedByUserid, javaType=java.lang.String , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, SUBMITTED_BY_NAME = #{dto.submittedByName, javaType=java.lang.String , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, SUBMITTED_BY_DATE = #{dto.submittedByDate, javaType=java.util.Date , jdbcType=DATE, mode=IN}, RECOMMENDED_BY_USERID = #{dto.recommendedByUserid, javaType=java.lang.String , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, RECOMMENDED_BY_NAME = #{dto.recommendedByName, javaType=java.lang.String , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, RECOMMENDED_BY_DATE = #{dto.recommendedByDate, javaType=java.util.Date , jdbcType=DATE, mode=IN}, APPROVED_BY_USERID = #{dto.approvedByUserid, javaType=java.lang.String , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, APPROVED_BY_NAME = #{dto.approvedByName, javaType=java.lang.String , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, APPROVED_BY_DATE = #{dto.approvedByDate, javaType=java.util.Date , jdbcType=DATE, mode=IN}, UPDATE_CLAIM_CALC_USER_GUID = #{dto.updateClaimCalcUserGuid, javaType=java.lang.String , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, UPDATE_USER = #{userId, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE CLAIM_CALCULATION_GUID = #{claimCalculationGuid}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(T.CLAIM_CALCULATION_GUID) FROM CLAIM_CALCULATION T JOIN CROP_COMMODITY CT ON CT.CROP_COMMODITY_ID = T.CROP_COMMODITY_ID JOIN COMMODITY_COVERAGE_CODE CCC ON CCC.COMMODITY_COVERAGE_CODE = T.COMMODITY_COVERAGE_CODE JOIN INSURANCE_PLAN IP ON IP.INSURANCE_PLAN_ID = T.INSURANCE_PLAN_ID WHERE 1 = 1

SELECT * FROM (
, IP.INSURANCE_PLAN_NAME FROM CLAIM_CALCULATION T JOIN CROP_COMMODITY CT ON CT.CROP_COMMODITY_ID = T.CROP_COMMODITY_ID JOIN COMMODITY_COVERAGE_CODE CCC ON CCC.COMMODITY_COVERAGE_CODE = T.COMMODITY_COVERAGE_CODE JOIN INSURANCE_PLAN IP ON IP.INSURANCE_PLAN_ID = T.INSURANCE_PLAN_ID LEFT JOIN CLAIM_CALCULATION_USER CR_CCU ON CR_CCU.CLAIM_CALCULATION_USER_GUID = T.CREATE_CLAIM_CALC_USER_GUID LEFT JOIN CLAIM_CALCULATION_USER UPD_CCU ON UPD_CCU.CLAIM_CALCULATION_USER_GUID = T.UPDATE_CLAIM_CALC_USER_GUID LEFT JOIN CROP_COMMODITY_PEDIGREE_XREF CCPX ON CCPX.CROP_COMMODITY_ID_PEDIGREE = T.CROP_COMMODITY_ID ) T WHERE 1=1
OFFSET #{offset, javaType=java.lang.Integer, jdbcType=INTEGER, mode=IN} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pageRowCount, javaType=java.lang.Integer, jdbcType=INTEGER, mode=IN} ROWS ONLY
, IP.INSURANCE_PLAN_NAME FROM CLAIM_CALCULATION T JOIN INSURANCE_PLAN IP ON IP.INSURANCE_PLAN_ID = T.INSURANCE_PLAN_ID WHERE T.CLAIM_NUMBER = #{claimNumber} ORDER BY T.CALCULATION_VERSION DESC

, IP.INSURANCE_PLAN_NAME FROM CLAIM_CALCULATION T JOIN CROP_COMMODITY CT ON CT.CROP_COMMODITY_ID = T.CROP_COMMODITY_ID JOIN COMMODITY_COVERAGE_CODE CCC ON CCC.COMMODITY_COVERAGE_CODE = T.COMMODITY_COVERAGE_CODE JOIN INSURANCE_PLAN IP ON IP.INSURANCE_PLAN_ID = T.INSURANCE_PLAN_ID LEFT JOIN CLAIM_CALCULATION_USER CR_CCU ON CR_CCU.CLAIM_CALCULATION_USER_GUID = T.CREATE_CLAIM_CALC_USER_GUID LEFT JOIN CLAIM_CALCULATION_USER UPD_CCU ON UPD_CCU.CLAIM_CALCULATION_USER_GUID = T.UPDATE_CLAIM_CALC_USER_GUID LEFT JOIN CROP_COMMODITY_PEDIGREE_XREF CCPX ON CCPX.CROP_COMMODITY_ID_PEDIGREE = T.CROP_COMMODITY_ID WHERE T.CLAIM_NUMBER = #{claimNumber} AND T.CALCULATION_VERSION = #{calculationVersion}
